Congress showered corporations and the 1% with more than a trillion dollars in tax breaks last year under the guise of a middle-class tax cut. That’s not right. Today, I introduced my LIFT the Middle Class Act – a real tax cut for the middle class.

Today I reintroduced the EL CHAPO Act. The bill would reserve any amounts forfeited to the US gov as a result of criminal prosecution of “El Chapo” & other drug lords for border security assets and the completion of the wall along the US-Mexico border. --> https://www.cruz.senate.gov/?p=press_release&id=4244 http://pbs.twimg.com/tweet_video_thumb/DwBL4CTWkAEzJEr.jpg https://video.twimg.com/tweet_video/DwBL4CTWkAEzJEr.mp4

Learn more via @WPLGLocal10 here: http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DwA-hNcWoAA36Cx.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1080932525579620352/vid/320x180/XwYPyTejM91Lr43v.mp4?tag=9

First item the Senate will take up in the new congress will be our bill to deal with the crisis in #Syria & support our allies in the Middle East. 

You can read the text of our bill Strengthening America’s Security in the Middle East Act of 2019 here: https://www.rubio.senate.gov/public/_cache/files/ecad7aff-d8d7-4e74-a987-d7edc1cfdc59/3CAB5B3DCC3C891E4ACDA9244433299B.syriaros19020-signed-by-rubio.pdf

Today @senatemajldr, @SenatorRisch, @SenCoryGardner, and I unveiled legislation to impose new sanctions on #Syria, strengthen U.S. security in the Middle East, and bolster our alliance with #Israel. We must quickly pass and enact this critical bill. https://www.rubio.senate.gov/public/index.cfm?p=Press-Releases&id=B4A12F25-3B6C-41BC-A43C-ADF5A644AAF5

While I’m sad to see my friend @NikkiHaley leave her post as UN ambassador, I’m excited to see what the future holds for her. She fought tirelessly for #HumanRights in the Western Hemisphere & around the world. She has been and will continue to be a leading voice for our country. https://twitter.com/AmbNikkiHaley/status/1080179785450557443 QT @AmbNikkiHaley As we enter 2019, I feel blessed to have had the opportunity to rep the country I love so much. Thank you Mr. President for the honor of a lifetime. Thanks to all who have supported us. To keep up with what’s next refollow me at @nikkihaley and tell your friends & family! ❤️🇺🇸 http://pbs.twimg.com/media/Dv2RvGIXQAE3MYw.jpg

An important moment in history as the 116th Congress is sworn in. This new class is the most diverse and includes the most women in history. Our government is beginning to better reflect the people it represents. Progress.
The middle class is the backbone of our democracy. It has been so since the birth of democracy itself. #ForThePeople

I’m happy to see one of the first success stories from the First Step Act. I look forward to seeing more from our important criminal justice reform. https://www.tennessean.com/story/news/crime/2019/01/03/matthew-charles-prisonrelease-first-step-act/2473316002/
The very first bill I’m introducing today, on the first day of the 116th Congress, is a real tax cut for the middle class.

Today @VernBuchanan, @RepAlLawsonJr, and I reintroduced our bill to help #Florida fruit and vegetable growers combat Mexico’s unfair trade practices. I remain committed to ensuring that we level the playing field for Florida farmers. https://www.rubio.senate.gov/public/index.cfm?p=Press-Releases&id=BB2484F3-8571-4271-AFAD-F6D36DB2B659

After 6 months, I’m hopeful that @nationalgridus will #endthelockout now. When workers come together in a union, they gain power to fight for better wages & benefits – and I'm fighting alongside @Usw04 National Grid workers so they can get back to work. https://www.bostonglobe.com/news/nation/2019/01/02/national-grid-negotiations-continue/0oqxyaERA83WOvJBpVl4YM/story.html

Last week I discussed my accomplishments in the 115th Congress for the people of #Florida. Today, as the 116th Congress gets sworn in, I will continue fighting for the Sunshine State.

I urge my colleagues to submit this constitutional amendment to the states for speedy ratification. —> https://www.cruz.senate.gov/?p=press_release&id=4245

Today @RepRooney and I introduced an amendment to the U.S. Constitution to impose term limits on members of Congress. The amendment would limit U.S. senators to two six-year terms and members of the U.S. House of Representatives to three two-year terms.
Tune in as Members of Congress & their families participate in our ceremonial swearing-in. https://twitter.com/i/broadcasts/1OdJrRYBpqkJX

I’m glad that U.S. Ambassador to Russia Jon Huntsman was able to visit detained American citizen Paul Whelan. As I continue to monitor this concerning situation, I hope it is resolved quickly. https://www.cnn.com/2019/01/02/us/russia-detains-us-citizen-paul-whelan/index.html

I wore all-white today to honor the women who paved the path before me, and for all the women yet to come.

From suffragettes to Shirley Chisholm, I wouldn’t be here if it wasn’t for the mothers of the movement. ⬇️ https://twitter.com/amandalitman/status/1080879883990065154 QT @amandalitman Early suffragists wore all white. Shirley Chisholm wore all white to be sworn in. Geraldine Ferraro wore all white when she accepted the VP nomination. Hillary Clinton wore all white to accept the Democratic nomination in 2016. And today, @AOC is wearing all white. History!!

The nation could stand to learn a thing or two from the way we do things in Texas!

So proud of the cont. progress in my home city of Newark on so many fronts: from improving schools to increasing jobs for community.This years success in lowering crime is a credit to many, esp. the leadership of Mayor Baraka & Director Ambros. Congrats!

https://www.nj.com/essex/2019/01/cops-on-the-streets-help-newark-set-a-record-5-decades-in-the-making.html

Deliberately ignoring the global threat of climate change and, instead, favoring polluters over Americans’ health won’t make our country stronger. We can’t leave our children and our children’s children to deal with the consequences of our inaction.

Congress has a clear mandate from the American people: secure the border and build the wall. Ensuring the safety and security of Texans is one of my top priorities. Indeed, I have long called for building a wall as a necessary step in defending our border.
Fourteen billion dollars will go a long way to secure our southern border, and hinder the illegal flow of drugs, weapons, and individuals.

America delivered a new House Majority w/ a stern message for Washington: Republicans’ attacks on health care must end. 
 
@RepColinAllred & our transformational freshmen are leading the charge to #ProtectOurCare and stop the GOP's assault on people with pre-existing conditions. https://twitter.com/RepColinAllred/status/1080954413261443072 QT @RepColinAllred On my first day in Congress, I'm proud to lead the charge against this partisan lawsuit attacking Americans’ health care. We will not stand idly by while special interest forces and their allies in Washington look to rip away health care from millions of hard-working Americans.

For too long, members of Congress have abused their power and ignored the will of the American people. Term limits on members of Congress offer a solution to the brokenness we see in Washington, D.C. It is long past time for Congress to hold itself accountable.
Together, we did it. It's time to get this House – your House – to work #ForThePeople and the future of our children. -NP

We have heard from too many families who wonder, in this time of innovation and globalization, if they have a place in the economy of the future. We must remove all doubt that they do, and say to them: we will have an economy that works for you. #ForThePeople

Residents in the Merrimack Valley need answers about the September 13th #MVGasFires, not more delays. We need to end the #TrumpShutdown now and stop hurting hard-working families. https://twitter.com/SenMarkey/status/1080956995828662274 QT @SenMarkey The #TrumpShutdown has shut down the federal investigation into the #MVGasFires and is shutting down justice for the residents of the Merrimack Valley impacted by the disaster. We need to fund government so the @NTSB can complete its investigation.

Today, I was sworn-in for my second term in the United States Senate. It’s been my honor to represent the Commonwealth, and I plan to keep on fighting for a government that works for everyone, not just the wealthy and the well-connected. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DwAMkShWwAAcOsq.jpg

RT @tedlieu Two reasons @NancyPelosi is about to become Speaker of the House:

1. She is awesome.

2. GOP ran on building the Wall and hating on immigrants. Dems ran on healthcare and infrastructure. #GOP got crushed by the largest vote margin in US history.

#ElectionsHaveConsequences https://twitter.com/keithboykin/status/1080828162177671168 QT @keithboykin As Nancy Pelosi becomes Speaker of the House and Democrats take control, that means Donald Trump, for the first time in his adult life, will have someone to say no to him. http://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1080828031281844229/pu/img/BqGiWUPDtoWOWj-v.jpg https://video.twimg.com/ext_tw_video/1080828031281844229/pu/vid/318x180/FYcjDajKHL812Wto.mp4?tag=6

Giant drug companies only care about one thing: raking in profits on the backs of patients. Mergers that mean more money for drug company CEOs while patients pay the price are not a solution to skyrocketing drug costs. https://www.nytimes.com/2019/01/03/business/dealbook/bristol-myers-squibb-celgene-merger.html
